name: The One Handed Hero of Hastings
name_original: The One Handed Hero of Hastings
description:
A game created by Mr Business Industries for submission in The Gamemaker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019. Theme of Only One is followed as the Player Character only has one arm.  Circa 04/08/19.

By Connor Houghton, Eddie Fulton, Joseph Jennett, Josh Froud and William Jennett.

Special Thanks to Caroline Jennett
